summary.Title: Administrative Assistant to Vinoteket.com
summary.Presentation: Do you have experience within administration and a great interest in procurement? Do you want to work for one of the leading and fastest growing online stores for wine in Sweden and Denmark?

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have experience within administration and a great interest in procurement? Do you want to work for one of the leading and fastest growing online stores for wine in Sweden and Denmark?

Vinoteket.com is looking for a positive team player with high ambitions to contribute to a winning team!

On behalf of our customer, Vinoteket.com, we are looking for an administrative assistant to solve procurement-related tasks to join the team in Køge as soon as possible.


The company
Vinoteket.com offers good wine at a great price with fast and free home delivery. The company consists of ambitious employees, who are all digital natives, fast-moving, and have a common interest in food and wine.

The company is small, agile, and adaptive to great ideas. You will become a part of a young and dynamic team, where everyone is highly engaged and depending on each other. Furthermore, Vinoteket.com is a company, where mistakes are opportunities to develop.

Køge is a lovely city based 30 minutes south of Copenhagen, if you go by car, and 1 hour with public transportation from the central station.


The job
As our administrative assistant, you will maintain Back Office support on orders and deliveries.

Your key job responsibilities will e.g., include:

• Product and order administration such as sending orders, updating orders, changing quantities, and other standard changes.
• Organization and prioritization of tasks.
• Follow-ups on orders and deliveries.
• Communication with wineries and logistic partners mainly over e-mail.

You will solve your tasks in close collaboration with your colleagues in Sales, Marketing, Finance and IT.

It will be possible to work remotely, but the tasks will mainly be carried out from the head office in Køge.

 

Qualifications
Vinoteket.com is looking for a structured and positive team player with solid organizational skills and the ability to work independently when needed. To become successful in this role we imagine that you:

• Have experience in administration, Back Office-support, or equivalent. It is an advantage if you have experience in retail, within e-commerce, or similar areas.
• Are process-minded and have a logical understanding of the data flow.
• Are fluent in English. It would be an advantage if you also speak Danish or Swedish.
• Have flair for IT. It will be a plus if you have experience with using Google Suite, G-Mail, Excel, Shared Goggle Files, and/or an ERP system like Visma.

As a person, you are rational, proactive, and have a hands-on approach. You need to have an operational understanding and the ability to finish tasks.

Vinoteket.com is looking forward to welcoming you to a fun and dynamic group of people, where your input is valued.



Practical information
It is a full-time position.
The salary is based on qualifications.
The startup will be as soon as possible.

StudentConsulting will handle the recruitment process, but you will be directly employed at Vinoteket.com.

If you would like to join a winning team and contribute to Vinoteket.com’s journey of growth please send your resume and application as soon as possible. We will interview candidates on an ongoing basis.

For further information, please contact Recruiter, Anne-Maja Kobbelgård, at anne-maja.kobbelgard@studentconsulting.com.


We look forward to receiving your application!
